title: Trump Supporters: The "Christian Nation" Is Coming

media:group.media:title: Trump Supporters: The "Christian Nation" Is Coming
media:group.media:description:
Trump supporters at a rally for Doug Mastriano in Pennsylvania were asked if they think we should live in a Christian nation. They said we should but had a really difficult time describing what that means. Michael Shure reports on the scene for The Young Turks. Watch TYT LIVE on weekdays 6-8 pm ET. http://youtube.com/theyoungturks/live
